aboutus.title: Unique approach of your family tree
aboutus.subTitle: The Stamboom lets you create your familytree with great ease, in an attractive overview.

paragraphs.title: How The Stamboom was created
paragraphs.content: When working on the family history, you will gather a lot of data. At some point you want to put all that in an attractive overiew.

paragraphs.title: The added value of The Stamboom
paragraphs.content: By enabling this tool for everybody, carpe diem

paragraphs.title: We would appreciate you contacting us!

features.title: The features of The Stamboom tools
features.subTitle: The Stamboom tools help you generate an attractive overview of your familytree as a Fanchart or Pedigree. Print as a poster, or on canvas, and make it a great gift to family members or friends.

features.title: Fanchart
features.description: The Fanchart tool enables you in an easy way to show all your known ancestors in one clear overview. Add names, years and photos yourself via the advanced editor, or use a silhouet from The Stamboom library. If you already have the data present from a geneaolgy app or site, use the  GEDCOM format to upload your familytree!

features.title: Fanchart & Pedigree
features.description:
The Pedigree shows your familytree from the oldest known ancestors. This tool will handle hundreds of familymembers and still show them in a clear overview. Print in a large size to hang it on the wall, or us it online to navigate through your complete family.

This package contains both the Fanchart and the Pedigree tool!

features.title: Fanchart & Pedigree Unlimited
features.description: This package features not only both the Fanchart and the Pedigree tool; it also allows you to make unlimited outputs for a year (of course this is based on fair use). Use the online tools as an overview for the archive of your familytree.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subTitle: We made a Basic, Standard and Pro plan to suit your preferences.  All plans offer a variety of features to create a great familytree.

questions.response: Click on your profile picture in the top right corner of the page and select Account Settings

questions.question: How Does Payment System Work?
questions.response: A payment system is a way to transfer money from one person or organization to another.
